file_content.text: Vastil said you'd come. If you'll wait a moment, I'll find him.
No need, doctor. You can return to your duties.
The recruits are resting, and Cole will be fine once the doctors are through with him.
We've heard of your victory against the Geonosians. The battle must have been impressive.
The fight was brutal and cold. Don't aspire to such violence.
More grim than impressive.
I didn't, I mean... I'm grateful for what you've done. You've taught us well.
Nothing's more spectacular than vanquishing an entire army.
My victory was glorious.
I can't wait to experience the thrill myself. You've taught us a great deal.
I'm not helping next time.
The recruits and I can take on the next threat. You've taught us much.
I'm to be fully initiated into the Anchorhead militia, thanks to you!
Do you have any advice for me before I join the service?
Continue on your current course. May the Force be with you.
Don't stray from your path.
I'm honored, Master Jedi.
Respect the people of Tatooine, and the Force will guide you.
Value those around you.
I think I understand. You're too kind, Master Jedi.
Trust your instincts. They'll serve you better than years of training.
Have faith in your intuition.
I'll be sure to remember that, sir.
You find any contraband, you contact a professional. Here's my holofrequency.
Look out for illicit goods.
Don't think I'm supposed to do that, but I appreciate the advice.
Don't join the militia.
I'll... I'll think about it.
Sorry, kid. You're on your own.
Nope.
I understand. I'm in charge of my own destiny now.
Thank you again. I'll carry myself in your image as I defend the city.
Didn't think you'd make it. We never should have tried to fight.
I was injured but managed to escape. The other recruits, Cole... they weren't so lucky.
I wish things had turned out differently.
That's terrible. I'm sorry.
I'll construct a memorial to honor them once my condition improves.
I stand by my decision.
I wish that softened their loss. I'll see that a memorial's built to honor their sacrifice, just as soon as I've recovered.
What will you do now?
We bury the dead, construct a memorial in their memory.
The doctors say I'll heal, but I won't regain the use of my shooting arm. I'll never make it into the militia now.
Could I try using the Force to repair your wounds?
Perhaps I can heal you?
No! Please... I appreciate your concern, but you've done enough already.
Sorry to hear that. You would've served them well.
The militia will miss you.
Your opinion means much to me, sir.
Travel the galaxy, get into trouble. Everyone loves a war hero.
There's still plenty to do.
My place is here on Tatooine.
Isn't there some chance of recovery?
Are you sure?
No. The doctors were sure of that much.
I'm not to blame.
I know, it's just... I don't know what I'm going to do anymore.
If you'll excuse me, I must rest. Once I've recovered, I'll try to find some new purpose to my life.
